text: Bloodhounds of Broadway is a 1952 American musical comedy movie. It was directed by Harmon Jones. The movie is based on the story of the same name by Damon Runyon. Actors include Mitzi Gaynor, Mitzi Green, Scott Brady, Marguerite Chapman, and Wally Vernon. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was remade in 1989. ==Other websites== * * Category:1952 comedy movies Category:1952 musical movies Category:American comedy movies Category:1950s American musical movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Harmon Jones
title: Bloodhounds of Broadway (1952 movie)
